content:
From: Erin Power <xampprocky@icloud.com>
Hello everyone,

The University of Macedonia, has offered to give us their corporate discount with some hotels. You can use the discount code “ALL HANDS” to get the corporate discount rate for any of the hotels listed on the website.

Hotel Recommendations: https://rust-lang.github.io/all-hands-2020/location.html#hotel-recommendations <https://rust-lang.github.io/all-hands-2020/location.html#hotel-recommendations>

Thank you for your time,

Erin (@XAMPPRocky)
